meanings.sent1: Every morning, she dons her favorite dress.
meanings.sent2: He dons his coat before going outside.
meanings.sent3: The superhero dons their cape to save the day.
meanings.sent4: The actor dons the costume to become their character.
meanings.sent5: The knight dons their armor before battle.

meanings.definition: A university teacher, especially a senior member of a college
meanings.sent1: The dons at the university are respected by students.
meanings.sent2: She aspires to become a don at the prestigious college.
meanings.sent3: The dons gathered for a meeting to discuss academic matters.
meanings.sent4: The wise don guided the students with valuable knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The don's office is filled with books and research papers.

meanings.definition: To give (a title or honor) to someone
meanings.sent1: The queen dons knighthood upon the brave soldier.
meanings.sent2: They don the title of 'Employee of the Month' with pride.
meanings.sent3: The mayor dons the key to the city to the visiting celebrity.
meanings.sent4: The committee dons recognition to outstanding volunteers.
meanings.sent5: The president dons medals of valor to the heroes.
